nodes.name: Are there messages to send? - Tasks

telegramApi.name: üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports

parameters.content:
## ‚è∞ AUTOMATIC REMINDERS

### Tasks:
Checks the task table every minute and sends reminders to executors.

**Priorities:**
- üî¥ High
- üü° Medium
- üü¢ Low
- ‚ö†Ô∏è Reminder

## ‚è∞ AUTOMATIC REMINDERS PHOTO REPORTS

### Photo journal:
Checks the table every minute and sends reminders to send photo reports.

**Logic:**
- Checks the time of sending
- Generates a list of recipients
- Sends personalized messages
- Updates the sending status

telegramApi.name: üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports
üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports

parameters.content:
## üîß SERVICE COMMANDS

### Available commands:
- **/start** - system registration
- **/help** - work guide
- **/status** - report status for the day
- **/report** - manual report sending
- **/read** - confirm reading (photos)
- **/received** - confirm receiving (tasks)

## üë§ REGISTRATION BLOCK

### Process of registering new executors:
1. **Check registration** - checks if user is in the database
2. **Request data** - if new, requests name and company
3. **Save to table** - writes data to Google Sheets
4. **Confirmation** - sends welcome message

parameters.text:
‚ùå **Error processing photo!**

{{ $json.errorMessage || 'An unknown error occurred' }}

üì∏ **What to do:**
1. Check photo size (maximum 20 MB)
2. Make sure you are replying to the correct message
3. Try sending the photo again

If the error persists, contact the manager.

telegramApi.name: üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports
üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports
üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports

parameters.content:
## üîÑ PHOTO PROCESSING FLOW

1. User replies to reminder with photo
2. System extracts Task ID from reminder text
3. Photo is uploaded to Google Drive
4. Checks for existing entry in table
5. If entry exists - adds to existing
6. If not - creates new entry
7. Sends confirmation

## üì∏ PHOTO REPORT PROCESSING

### Main functionality:

1. **Data extraction** - parsing Task ID from message
2. **Upload to Drive** - saving photo to Google Drive
3. **Grouping** - combining multiple photos of one task
4. **Writing to table** - updating or creating entry
5. **Confirmation** - notification of successful upload

‚ö†Ô∏è Report with ID not found: {{ $node['Extract Location Data1'].json.taskId }}

üì∏ First, send the photo for this report, then you can add GPS coordinates.

**Order of actions:**
1. Reply to the reminder with a photo
2. After photo send confirmation, reply to the same reminder with geolocation

If the error persists, contact the manager.

telegramApi.name: üìã Project Management and Monitoring of Tasks & Photo Reports

parameters.content:
## üìç GEOLOCATION PROCESSING

### GPS Coordinates:

- Link to existing report
- Save coordinates and map link
- Update record in the table

## üìä DATA STRUCTURE

### Google Sheets Tables:
1. **Users** - data of registered users
2. **Photo Reports** - all photo reports
3. **Tasks** - list of tasks and their statuses

### Key Fields:
- **Task ID** / **Report ID** - unique identifier
- **Executor ID** - Telegram Chat ID
- **Status** - task completion status

## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT NOTES
1. **Task ID = Report ID** - these are the same identifier
2. **File Grouping** - multiple photos can relate to one task
3. **Recurring Reminders** - sent at specified intervals
4. **Time Validation** - accounts for Europe/Minsk timezone

## üöÄ ENTRY POINT

### Telegram Webhook

Handles all incoming messages from users:
- Commands (/start, /help, /status, etc.)
- Photos for reports
- Text reports on tasks
- Geolocation

## üìã TEXT REPORT PROCESSING

### Task Reports:

- Verify task owner
- Parse status (completed/partially/not completed)
- Update status in the tasks table
- Send confirmation to the executor
